name: Space Rocket Survival
description:
• Space Rocket Survival is a game without any tutorials. You have to learn how to survive in a hostile space. Rockets follow you to make your spaceship to explode and bombs are ready to activate their « Boom! ». The difficulty of the game graduates constantly. Your goal: make a better score than the previous game.

    SpaceRocket Survival is a simple and fast game with simple mechanics and an addictive gameplay. It’s easy to understand and funny to play. It’s brings a satisfaction once you make a dodge from more than 30 rockets!

    Bonus content:
    -Bombs
    -Shields
    -Boost(Oil)
    -BigBoost(RedOil)
    -Coins
    -Asteroids 
  • and more...

    Have fun!
